import React,{useState}from"react";import{customerReviews}from"../Scripts/reviews";import"../Styles/Reviews.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Reviews(){let rMessage,rName,rLocation;const reviewsLength=customerReviews.length-1;const[review,setReview]=useState(0);// back to previous review
const backBtnClick=()=>{setReview(review<=0?reviewsLength:review-1);handleReviewsUpdation();};// go to newer review
const frontBtnClick=()=>{setReview(review>=reviewsLength?0:review+1);handleReviewsUpdation();};// update reviews
const handleReviewsUpdation=()=>{const reviewMessage=customerReviews[review];rName=reviewMessage.name;rLocation=reviewMessage.location;rMessage=reviewMessage.message;};// list review on visit
handleReviewsUpdation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"review-section",id:"reviews",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rw-text-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"rw-text-title",children:["More over ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"rw-text-num",children:"1500+ Customers"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"rw-text-desc",children:"Don't believe us, Check clients word"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"rw-text-format",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"rw-text-quote1",children:"''"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"rw-review",children:rMessage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"rw-text-quote2",children:"''"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rw-authors",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rw-names",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"rw-reviewer-name",children:rName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"rw-reviewer-place",children:rLocation})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rw-btns",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"rw-next-btn",type:"button",onClick:backBtnClick,children:"\u2190"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"rw-next-btn",type:"button",onClick:frontBtnClick,children:"\u2192"})]})]})]})});}export default Reviews;
